column2: KIZhININ ERGELERININ BUGU-NIITI UGUULGAZY

Kizhi torelgeten aimaanyn bugu kezhigunnerinin  kizhi mozuzun, olarnyn den bolgash kazyp bolbas ergelerin khuleep kooru khostalganyn, choptug choruktun baza bugu-niiti taibynnyn undezini bolurun kicheengeige albyshaan; baza

kizhinin ergeleringe toomcha chok bolgash koor khoon chok choruktun kizhi torelgetennin sagyzhyn aartyp duvuretken derzii uulgediglerge chedirgenin baza kizhiler  sostun bolgash uzeldernin   khostalgazynga ergelig, korguushkun bolgash turegdelden khostug  delegeini turguzary kizhilernin bedik chutkulu kyldyr charlattynganyn  kicheengeige albyshaan; baza

kizhinin ergeleri khooiluga  kizhi  uzhur-durum chok chagyrgaga bolgash darlalgaga udur soolgu arga kyldyr  tura khalyyshkyn azhyglaar uzhurga tavaryshpas  kyldyr kamgalattyngan turarynyn ergezhok chugulazyn kicheengeige albyshaan; baza
chonnar arazynga ep-naiyraldyg kharylzaalarnyn saizyralyn detkiirinin ergezhok chugulazyn kicheengeige albyshaan; baza

Kattyshkan Natsiyalarnyn chonnarynyn kizhinin kol ergeleringe, kizhi mozuzunge bolgash unezinge baza er bolgash khereezhen kizhilernin den ergeliinge buzurelin Ustavta badytkaanyn baza  ulam khostug baidalga sotsial depshilgeni bolgash amydyraldyn baidaldaryn ekizhiderin   detkiirin shiitpirleenin   kicheengeige albyshaan; baza

kezhigun-kurunelernin Kattyshkan Natsiyalar Organizatsiyazy-bile kady azhyldavyshaan, kizhinin ergelerin bolgash  kol khostalgalaryn bugudenin khunduleerin baza sagyyryn chedip alyrynga detkimche beerin khuleengenin  kicheengeige albyshaan; baza
bo ergelernin bolgash khostalgalarnyn kharakterin bugudenin ugaap biliri ol khuleelgeni doluzu-bile kuusediringe ulug uzhur-duzalyg bolurun kicheengeige albyshaan,
Chingine Assambleya

Kizhinin ergelerinin bo bugu-niiti uguulgazyn bugu chonnarnyn bolgash kurunelernin kuusedir deesh kyzydar uzhurlug baza  kizhi buruzu bolgash  niitileldin organ buruzu uk Uguulgany  doktaamal kicheengeige albyshaan, chyrydylga bolgash ooredilge argalary-bile uk ergeler bile khostalgalarny khunduleerin detkiir, natsional  bolgash ulustar arazynyn depshilgelig khemcheglerin azhyglap turgash, Organizatsiyanyn  kezhigunu kurunelerinin baza ol kurunelernin yurisdiktsiyazynda turar deviskeerlernin chonnarynyn arazynga olarny bugudenin khuleep koorun baza ure-tunneldig bottanyryn detkiirinche uglangan  sorulga kyldyr charlap tur.
1 chuul

Bugu kizhiler khostug baza mozuzu bolgash ergeleri den kyldyr toruttuner. Olarga ugaansaryyl bolgash aryn-nuur berdingen bolur bolgash olar bot-bottarynga  aky-dunmalyshky khamaarylgany  korguzer uzhurlug.
2 chuul

Kizhi buruzu uk Uguulgada charlattyngan bugu ergelerge bolgash khostalgalarga  yazy-soogu, kezhinin onu, er-khereezheni, dyly, chudulgezi, politiktig bolgash oske-daa uzelderi, natsional bolgash sotsial yzyguuru, onchu-khorengizi, angy bolgash oske-daa  baidaldardan khamaan chokka  ergelig.

Oon angyda, kizhini oon khamaarzhyp turary kurunenin azy deviskeernin politiktig, khooilu-durum azy chonnar arazynda statuzun, uk deviskeernin khamaaryshpazyn, oskelernin kharagalzalynda turaryn, bot-bashkarylga chok azy bot-dogunnaashkynynda kandyg-bir kyzygaarlyg boop turaryn barymdaalap ylgaar choruk turbas uzhurlug.
3 chuul
Kizhi buruzu amydyrap-churttaar, khostug bolur bolgash deep bolbas ergelig.
4 chuul
Kym-daa kuldanygga azy khostug eves baidalga tuttunmas uzhurlug; kuldanygnyn bolgash kul sadarynyn bugu khevirleri khoruglug.
5 chuul
Kym-daa  erii-shaazhyga azy karzhy, kizhizig eves azy oon kizhi mozuzun  doramchylaan aazhylalga bolgash  shiitkelge  tavaryshpas uzhurlug.
6 chuul
Kizhi buruzu kayaa-daa choraash, oon tuskai subekt ergeliin  khuleep koorunge ergelig.
7 chuul

Bugu kizhiler khooilu murnunga den ergelig baza khooiluga kandyg-daa ylgal chokka, den kamgaladyr ergelig. Bugu kizhiler uk Uguulgany khazhydyp turar ylgai koruushkunden baza yndyg ylgai koruushkunnu kylyrynche  kutkulgeden  den  kamgaladyr ergelig.
8 chuul
Kizhi buruzu konstitutsiya azy khooilu ezugaar kordungen kol ergeleri khazhyttyngan tavarylgalarda dolu ergelig natsional shuugunun oon ergelerin katap ure-tunneldig turguzup beeringe ergelig.
9 chuul
Kym-daa barymdaa chok  khorugdalga, tudup khorugdaashkynga azy oiladyyshkynga tavaryshpas uzhurlug.
10 chuul

Kizhi buruzu oon ergelerin bolgash khuleelgelerin todaradyp beeringe baza anaa onaashtyryp turar kem-kherek buruudadyyshkynynyn barymdaalyyn  todaradyrynga baza oon khereen khamaaryshpas bolgash tala tyrtpas shuugunun azhyk bolgash choptug choruktun bugu negeldelerin sagyvyshaan,  saigaryp koorunge  ergelig.
11 chuul

Kem-kherek uulgetken dep buruudattyryp turar kizhi buruzu  kamgalaldyn bugu argalaryn khandyryp berip turar  azhyk shuugu saigarylgazynga oon buruuluu khooilu ezugaar todarattynmaan shaanda buruu chok dep sanadyr ergelig.

Kym-daa bolup turgan uezinde natsional khooilular azy chonnar arazynyn khooilu-durumu-bile kem-kherek uulgediishkini bolbain turgan kandyg-bir  kyldynyglardan azy chunu-daa kylbaanyndan ungen uulgedig deesh   shiittirbes uzhurlug. Ol yshkash uulgedignin bolgan uezinde berip bolur turgan kezemcheden aar kezemche beeri boldunmas.
12 chuul

Kym-daa oon amy-khuuda bolgash og-bule churttalgazynche turazynda kholgaarlaashkynga, bazhyn-balgadynga deep bolbazynga,  chagaalazhyyshkynynyn chazhyt choruunga azy at-aldary bolgash reputatsiyazynga shoglaashkynga tavaryshpas uzhurlug. Kizhi buruzu  khooiluga yndyg kholgaarlaashkyn azy shoglaashkynnardan  kamgaladyr  ergelig.
13 chuul
Kizhi buruzu kaiy-bir kurunenin kyzygaarynyn ishtinge khostug choruur bolgash bodunga churttaar cherni shilip alyr ergelig.
Kizhi buruzu kandyg-daa churttan, oon ishtinde bodunun churtundan baza  unup choruur baza bodunun churtunche eep keer ergelig.
14 chuul
Kizhi buruzu istep suruushkunden khorgadaldy oske churttardan dileer baza ol khorgadaldy azhyglaar ergelig.
Bo erge politiktig eves uulgedig azy Kattyshkan Natsiyalar Organizatsiyazynyn sorulga bolgash printsipteringe udurlanyshkak kyldynyglar deesh istep surup turar tavarylgada azhyglattynmas.
15 chuul
Kizhi buruzu khamaaty bolur ergelig.
Kym-daa  khamaaty ergezinden  azy khamaaty ergezin soluur ergezinden undezin chokka kazytpas uzhurlug.
16 chuul

Nazy chetken   er bolgash khereezhen kizhiler yazy-sook, natsionaly  azy chudulgezinin aaiybile kandyg-daa kyzygaarlaashkyn chokka oglenip, bodunun og-bulezin turguzar ergelig. Olar badylanyshkanynga khamaaryshtyr,  badylaldyg turgan uezinde baza onu kush chok dep sanaan uezinde  den ergelerni azhyglaar.
Badylazhyyshkyn chugle oglenchip turar iyi talanyn khostug bolgash  burun dugurzhulgazybile  boop bolur.
Og-bule niitileldin  chaigaar bolgash undezin uuru bolur baza niitilel bile kurunenin talazyndan kamgaladyr ergelig.
17 chuul
Kizhi buruzu onchu-khorengizin chaaskaan-daa, oskeler-bile kady-daa  edileer ergelig.
Kym-daa  onchu-khorengizin undezin chokka   khavyrtpas uzhurlug.
18 chuul

Kizhi buruzu bodaldyn, aryn-nuurnun bolgash chudulgenin  khostalgazynga ergelig; bo ergege bodunun chudulgezin azy uzelderin   oskertirinin khostalgazy baza  bodunun chudulgezin azy uzelderin chaaskaan-daa, oskeler-bile kady-daa khoige azy angy kyldyngan ooredilge, morgul baza shazhynchy bolgash ritualdyg ezulaldar damchyshtyr nepteredirinin khostalgazy  khamaarzhyp turar.
19 chuul

Kizhi buruzu uzeldernin baza olarny khostug ileredirinin khostalgazynga ergelig; bo ergege bodunun uzelderinge moondak chokka buzurep sagyyr baza kurune kyzygaarlaryndan khamaan chokka baza kandyg-daa arga-bile informatsiya bolgash ideyalarny dileer, alyr baza taradyr khostalga khamaarzhyp turar.
20 chuul
Kizhi buruzu taibyn chyysh bolgash  kattyzhyyshkynnarnyn khostalgazynga ergelig.
Kym-daa kaiy-bir kattyzhyyshkynga kireringe chygatpas uzhurlug.
21 chuul
Kizhi buruzu bodunun churtunun udurtulgazynga bodu dort azy khostug ezu-bile songutturgan toleelekchilerni damchyshtyr kirzhir ergelig.
Kizhi buruzu bodunun churtunga kurune albanynga  den kirer ergelig.

Chonnun kuzel-soruu chazaktyn erge-chagyrgazynyn undezini bolur uzhurlug; bo kuzelsoruk  alban niiti bolgash den  chazhyt badylaashkyn argazy-bile  azy  songuurunun khostalgazyn khandyryp turar  den chergelig oske khevirler duzazy-bile ertken  bolgash khazhydyyshkyn kyldynmaan oilep-oilep bolur  songuldalarga  ilerep  keer uzhurlug.
22 chuul

Kizhi buruzu  niitileldin kezhigunu bolganda, natsional kuzhenig bolgash chonnar arazynda kady azhyldazhylganyn achyzynda  kurune buruzunun kurlavyrlary bolgash turguzuunga duushtur kizhi mozuzun baksyratpain tudarynga   baza ekonomika, sotsial bolgash kultura adyrlarynga khostug saizyraarynga ergezhok chugula sotsial khandyrylga alyrynga  baza ergeleri  bottangan turarynga  ergelig.
23 chuul
Kizhi buruzu azhyldaar, azhyldy khostug shilip alyr, azhyldaar baidalynyn choptug bolgash taarymchalyg  bolurunga baza azhyl chok choruktan kamgalalga  ergelig.
Kizhi buruzu kandyg-daa ylgai koruushkun chokka den azhyl deesh den tolevir alyr ergelig.

Azhyldap turar kizhi buruzu  bodunun bolgash og-bulezinin  kizhi mozuzunge toleptig amydyraldy tudar choptug bolgash setkildi khandyryp turar baza kherek aparganda sotsial khandyrylganyn oske khevirlerinden nemeldelig tolevirni alyr ergelig.
Kizhi buruzu bodunun ergelerin kamgalaary-bile professionaldyg evilelder turguzar baza professionaldyg evilelderge  kirer ergelig.
24 chuul
Kizhi buruzu dyshtanylgaga baza khostug uege ergelig, oon ishtinde  azhyl khunun  shyn kyzygaarlaarynga baza  oilep-oilep  beer tolevirlig  sholeege  ergelig.
25 chuul

Kizhi buruzu amydyraldyn, oon ishtinde ash-chemnin, idik-kheptin, churttaar oransavanyn, emchi azhaalgazynyn baza ergezhok chugula sotsial khandyrylganyn oon bodunun bolgash og-bulezinin kadykshylyn baksyratpain tudarynga baza  chaagai baidalyn khandyrarynga  chetchir  denneldig bolurunga ergelig baza azhyl chok artkanda, aaraanda, invalid aparganda, dulguyak kalganda, nazylap kyraanda azy oon khamaaryshpas baidaldarda amydyraar argalaryn chidirgende, khandyrylga alyr ergelig.

Ie boluru bolgash chash nazyn tuskai azhaal-tezheel bolgash duza alyrynga ergeni berip turar. Bugu uruglar, og-bulege azy suras toruttungeninden khamaan chokka, domei sotsial kamgalaldy alyr uzhurlug.
26 chuul

Kizhi buruzu  oorenir ergelig. Ooredilge beti dize ege bolgash niiti ooredilgege khamaaryshtyr khalas bolur uzhurlug. Ege ooredilge alban bolur uzhurlug. Tekhniktig bolgash professionaldyg   ooredilge bugudege belen chedingir bolur uzhurlug baza deedi ooredilge kizhi buruzunun salymnyynyn aaiy-bile  bugudege  bir domei chedingir bolur uzhurlug.

Ertem-bilig kizhinin dolu saizyralynche bolgash kizhinin ergeleringe baza khostalgalarynga khundutkeldi bediderinche uglangan bolur uzhurlug. Ertem-bilig bugu chonnarnyn, sook-yazy baza shazhyn bolukterinin bot-bottaryn bilchiringe, oskelernin bodaldaryn,  chudulge-suzuglelderin khuleep biliringe,  ep-naiyraldyg chorukka baza Kattyshkan Natsiyalar Organizatsiyazynyn taibynny detkeen azhyl-chorudulgazynga detkimcheni beer uzhurlug.
Ada-ie ulus bottarynyn nazy chetpeen uruglarynyn ooredilgezinin khevirin chugulalap shiliir ergelig.
27 chuul
Kizhi buruzu niitileldin kultura amydyralynga khostug kirzhir, uran chuulden taalal alyr, ertem depshilgezinge kirzhir bolgash oon  kezhikterin azhyglaar ergelig.
Kizhi buruzu avtoru boop turary ertem, chogaal bolgash uran chuul azhyldarynyn tunneli bolur moraldyg bolgash materialdyg erge-azhyy kamgalattyngan turarynga ergelig.
28 chuul
Kizhi buruzu uk Uguulgada aiyttyngan ergeler bolgash khostalgalarny doluzu-bile khandyryp turar sotsial bolgash ulustar arazynyn korum-churumunga ergelig.
29 chuul
Kizhi buruzu oon khostug bolgash dolu saizyralyn khandyryp bolur niitileldin murnunga khuleelgelerlig.

Kizhi buruzu bodunun ergelerin bolgash khostalgalaryn bottandyryp turgash, khooilu ezugaar  oske kizhilernin ergeleri bile khostalgalaryn bolur-choguuru-bile khuleep koorun baza khunduleerin khandyrar baza demokrattyg niitilelge mozu-shynarnyn choptug negeldelerin, khoi-niiti churumun bolgash niiti chaagai baidaldy khandyrar sorulga-bile todarattyngan chugle yndyg kyzygaarlaashkynnarga tavarzhyr uzhurlug.
Ol ergelernin bolgash khostalgalarnyn bottandyryyshkyny kandyg-daa tavarylgada Kattyshkan Natsiyalar Organizatsiyazynyn sorulga bolgash printsipteringe  udurlanyshkak bolbas uzhurlug.
30 chuul

Uk Uguulgada chuu-daa chuve kaiy-bir kurunege, bolukke azy tus kizhilerge uk Uguulgada aiyttyngan ergeler bolgash khostalgalarny uzutkaarynche uglangan azhyldar chorudarynga azy kyldynyglar kylyrynga erge berip turar dep  taiylbyrlattynyp bolbas.
